name: EMILS
description:
A slime was rescued from low tier monsters by a human boy. They shortly became friends and formed a strong bond with each other. However, the human boy had to leave his slime friend behind. The slime then decided to start a journey with her bunny best friend to find the witch who has the ability to turn her into a human so she can be with her human friend once again.

Gameplay

In this game, the player takes the role of “Mr. Voice”. From the slime’s point of view, “Mr. Voice” is the otherworldly being who watches over and guides the innocent slime on her journey. Follow the rich story delivered via text on screen with multiple choices to choose. Assist Emils in navigating through the long way away from home. Help her make decisions and offer guidance when she seems unsure of the next steps. Be careful though! Your choices impact Emils' fate and the outcome may not be pleasant for the poor slime.
